definition: Young Pioneers of China, abbr. for 少年先鋒隊|少年先锋队[Shao4 nian2 Xian1 feng1 dui4]
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

sentences.english: Every morning young pioneers go to school in file.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨少先队员们排着两列纵队去上学。

sentences.english: A group of young pioneers always accompany the disabled girl to the school.
sentences.chinese: 一群少先队员常常送那位残疾女孩上学。

sentences.english: And of course pioneers wore a red pioneer tie, the main must-have item.
sentences.chinese: 当然，少先队员们是肯定会带上红领巾的。

sentences.english: Look, all of those Young Pioneers are wearing their red scarves .
sentences.chinese: 看，所有的那些少先队员都戴着红领巾。

sentences.english: The Young Pioneers helped Granny Wang (to) carry water.
sentences.chinese: 少先队员帮助王奶奶打水。

sentences.english: Before us were walking a group of Young Pioneers.
sentences.chinese: 在我们前面走着一群少先队员。

sentences.english: When did you join the Leage Youth?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候加入少先队的？

sentences.english: You are a Young Pioneer, aren't you?
sentences.chinese: 你是一名少先队员，对不对？

sentences.english: Some Young Pioneers presented some flowers to the visiting president.
sentences.chinese: 一些少先队员向来访总统献了鲜花。

sentences.english: Our school is a Young Pioneer subjects research experimental one in Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 我校是湖北省少先队课题研究试点单位。

sentences.english: A group of Young Pioneers planted many pines around the martyr's monument.
sentences.chinese: 一群少先队员在烈士纪念碑周围栽了许多松树。

sentences.english: The bright red scarf is Young Pioneer's symbol.
sentences.chinese: 鲜艳的红领巾就是少先队员的标志。

sentences.english: Young Pioneers must wear red scarfs in school.
sentences.chinese: 少先队员在校内必须佩戴红领巾。

sentences.english: Now, we are Young pioneers too.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，我们也是少先队员吗？

definition: Young Pioneers of China (primary school league, a preparation for Communist Youth League)/abbr. to 少先隊|少先队
red neckscarf/by extension, a member of the Young Pioneers

pinyin: Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: the Communist Youth League, abbr. for 共產主義青年團|共产主义青年团[Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]
to enroll in the Communist Youth League
Communist Youth League of China/China Youth League
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: youth corps/youth wing of a political party
to join a political party (esp. the Communist Party)
see 黑板報|黑板报[hei1 ban3 bao4]
